actions.name: Thieving Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage can steal one item target is wearing or carrying provided item weighs up to 10 pounds isn't a weapon and isn't wrapped around or firmly attached to target. Ex: it could steal a hat or belt pouch but not a creature's shirt or armor.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit 20/60 ft one target 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Elusive
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on saves and ability checks to avoid or escape effect that would reduce its speed. Also nonmagical difficult terrain composed of natural rocks or cavernous terrain doesn't cost it extra movement.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.
